rules.description: R0: Quit application by pressing command-q twice
R2: e-mode for media; have to add in manually into .json file
R4: d-mode for Nav and Edit
R10: Toggle caps_lock by pressing l_shift then r_shift
R0: Quit application by pressing command-q twice
R0: Quit application by pressing command-q twice
R2: e-mode for media; have to add in manually into .json file
R4: d-mode for Nav and Edit
R10: Toggle caps_lock by pressing l_shift then r_shift
caps_lock to left_command, esc if tapped
Quit application by pressing command-q twice
Toggle caps_lock by pressing left_shift then right_shift
Hyper + Space to delete word and backspace word with hyper+space+right_shift

manipulators.description: Avoid starting sysdiagnose with the built-in macOS shortcut cmd+shift+option+ctrl+,

from.description: Avoid starting sysdiagnose with the built-in macOS shortcut cmd+shift+option+ctrl+/

rules.description: Bottom Row Mods: Z to leftcontrol
Bottom Row Mods: x to left_shift
Bottom Row Mods: C to left_option
Bottom Row Mods: V to left_command
Bottom Row Mods: slash to right_control
Bottom Row Mods: period to right_shift
Bottom Row Mods: comma to right_option
Bottom Row Mods: M to left_command
